name: rapidjson
description: A fast JSON parser/generator for C++ with both SAX/DOM style API

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependent_to.name: arrow
dependent_to.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the C++ bindings.

dependent_to.name: py-awkward
dependent_to.description: Manipulate JSON-like data with NumPy-like idioms.

dependent_to.name: sarus
dependent_to.description: Sarus is an OCI-compliant container engine for HPC systems.

dependent_to.name: opencascade
dependent_to.description:
Open CASCADE Technology is a software development kit (SDK) intended for
development of applications dealing with 3D CAD data, freely available
in open source. It includes a set of C++ class libraries providing
services for 3D surface and solid modeling, visualization, data exchange
and rapid application development.

dependent_to.name: openbabel
dependent_to.description:
Open Babel is a chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of
chemical data. It's an open, collaborative project allowing anyone to
search, convert, analyze, or store data from molecular modeling,
chemistry, solid-state materials, biochemistry, or related areas.

dependent_to.name: pmemkv
dependent_to.description:
pmemkv is a local/embedded key-value datastore, optimized for persistent
memory.

dependent_to.name: py-awkward1
dependent_to.description: DEPRECATED! This package was renamed to py-awkward.
